{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Open Mesh |model=A40 |asin=B06X419FZW |price=165 |fcc_date=01/19/2017 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |type=outdoor access point, mesh hub |fcc_id=WT8OMA40 |ic_id=10103A-OMA40 |pwr_v=48-54 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9557 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12835FMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16BG-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9557 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9882;QCA9882-BR4A, FK636574, 1636, TAIWAN; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035 |eth_chip3_brand=Atheros |eth_chip3_model=AR8033 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''867Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|WiFi Access Point}} :[https://www.openmesh.com/products/wifi Product page] {{•}} [https://store.openmesh.com/products/access-points/a40-grouped-cloud-managed-access-point.html Support page] {{•}} [https://www.open-mesh.com/skin/frontend/rwd/default/media/A-Series-Datasheet.pdf A-Series Datasheet] "7016A1290004 V:1.00" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{see also|Open Mesh A42|Open Mesh A60}} ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33136-open-mesh-a40-a60-access-points-reviewed ''Open Mesh A40 & A60 Access Points Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
